item.title: Slides: Fullscreen
item.description: Git Git Review Version Control Software created by Linux Torvalds Similar to the Linux Kernel (also created by Torvalds) it is open source software Basic Workflow Adding changes to staging Committing changes to local git repo Pushing changes from local repo to remote Creating a Local Repo git init (within project directory) will initialize a git repository in your current directory This allows you to begin controlling “versions” of your project
